Class FileCounts

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileCounts

  • public class FileCounts
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of file details such as number of lines, words, characters and bytes.
    Author:
    Dusan Makevic

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileCounts(java.io.File file)
      Reads trough file and updates counter values for lines, words, tokens, characters and bytes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int byteCount()
      Shows the number of bytes in the file
      int charCount()
      Shows the number of characters in the file
      int lineCount()
      Shows the number of lines in the file
      int tokenCount()
      Shows the number of words in the file

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
